page.title: 19The Tedworth Fox Hounds
page.content: The Crown Inn at Everleigh is only one of the meeting places of the Tedworth Fox Hounds. The Master of Foxhounds Association, which is the governing body of Fox Hunting allocates areas to each hunt. That of the Tedworth Fox Hounds covers the area bounded by the A343 Andover to Newbury road to the East, the A4 West Kennet to the West, Wedhampton to the South and Tidworth (the present day spelling of Tedworth) to the South East. Foxes are sought in this area, but are only persued over these boundaries if necessary. The hounds meet three days per week between 1st September - 31st October for Cub Hunting and twice a week for Fox Hunting during the season commencing lst November.
